document_data.name: Wall of Shadow
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wall of shadow''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[conjuration]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Eshowdow]].
document_data.Effects: This spell created a permanent wall or ring of twilight the size of which depended on the skill of the caster. The "wall" version of this spell was always oriented vertically. A ''wall of shadow'' acted like an impenetrable ''[[wall of force]]'' to anything connected to the [[Negative Energy plane]] or the [[Shadowfell]]. Any creature not connected to the Shadowfell or Negative Energy plane that passed through the ''wall of shadow'' would experience the effects of an ''[[enervation]]'' spell that lasted for several hours.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] the priest's holy symbol and an area of shadow to cast.
